bibl.title: Notes on personal names and abbreviations in late Arsinoite and Heracleopolite documents

Vindob. Graec. Inv. 41039). - 6. S.B. XXII, 15244 (= P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 28016), etc. - 7. S.B. XXIV, 16141 (= P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 21801 recto). - 8. S.B. XXIV, 16142 (= P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 21801 verso). - 9. S.P.P. VIII, 709. - 10. S.P.P. VIII, 756. - 11. S.P.P. VIII, 887. - 12. S.P.P. VIII, 1309. - 13. S.P.P. X, 41, etc. - 14. S.P.P. X, 60. - 15. S.P.P. X, 74. - 16. S.P.P. X, 79. - 17. S.P.P. X, 85. - 18. S.P.P. X, 117 verso. - 19. S.P.P. X, 216. - 20. S.P.P. XX, 206. - 21. S.P.P. XX, 242. - 22. S.P.P. XX, 249. - 23. S.P.P. XX, 281.
bibl.seg: Nikolaos Gonis, Notes on personal names and abbreviations in late Arsinoite and Heracleopolite documents.
